caller_intent: The caller (Heather) wants to confirm an auto insurance quote from National General and schedule a follow-up to finalize details, particularly regarding payment timing and next steps.
resolution_steps: Agent (Maria and Lena) confirmed Heather's intent to proceed with the National General quote.
Discussed Heather's payment timeline (Friday) and agreed to schedule a follow-up call the next day.
Negotiated a tentative time window for the follow-up (after 11 AM, with flexibility to call at 4 PM or 5 PM).
Agreed to call back if Heather is unavailable during the scheduled window.
knowledge_required: Understanding of National General insurance products and quoting process
Ability to handle scheduling and customer availability coordination
Knowledge of auto insurance payment timelines and policy activation requirements
summary: Heather is finalizing an auto insurance quote with National General and needs assistance with next steps. The agent confirmed her intent and scheduled a follow-up call for the next day, with flexibility to accommodate Heather's availability (tentatively after 11 AM). The agent will call back if Heather is unavailable during the agreed window.
